DOC.brief_summary: In this study the investigators will use semi-structured interviews to qualitatively analyse patient and family member experiences with either deep brain stimulation or other forms of psychiatric neurosurgery.
DOC.brief_title: Psychiatric Neurosurgery (PNS) for Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD): A Qualitative Analysis of Patient and Family Member Experiences
DOC.criteria: (family member of) patient who has previously been treated with deep brain stimulation or anterior capsulotomy
